title: Amazon Essentials Oxford Shirts for Men - Regular-Fit, Short-Sleeve
description: REGULAR FIT: Experience comfortable and easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist with our regular-fit men's dress shirts
SOFT COTTON: This button up shirt men love is made from soft and durable 100% cotton oxford shirting
EVERYDAY STYLE: This mens oxford shirt features classic details, making it a versatile choice for all your everyday activities
CLASSIC DETAILS: This mens button up shirt has a convenient patch pocket at the chest, a back yoke with box-pleat, and a rounded hem

This men's oxford shirt is crafted from soft, durable 100% cotton. Its regular fit allows for comfortable, easy wear through the shoulders, chest, and waist, perfect for all-day wear. The men's short sleeve button down shirt features a patch pocket at the chest, and a back yoke with a box-pleat, all contributing to its refined design.
